name: Slender-like Blazed Body
description: Going though that portal warped you in a way that you did not expect, granting you the powers of The End.

badges.text:
While in End Form:
- You have 7 hearts
- Are 10% slimmer
- 10% less hunger usage
- Cannot use Elytras

While in Nether Form:
- You have 7 hearts
- Are 1.5 Blocks tall
- 10% more movement speed
- 10% less hunger usage
- Can use Elytras
